actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 403 (b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require reduced-rate transportation for certain disabled veterans of the Armed Forces of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require air carriers to provide half-fare air transportation on a space-available basis to disabled veterans.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 403 (b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require reduced-rate transportation for certain disabled veterans of the Armed Forces of the United States.
